nodes.label: HTML & CSS Basics
nodes.description: Learn how to structure and style web pages using HTML5 and CSS3.

nodes.label: Master JavaScript
nodes.description: Understand DOM, ES6+, event handling, and async programming.

nodes.label: Learn a Frontend Framework
nodes.description: Choose React, Vue, or Angular and learn component-based development.

nodes.label: Work with APIs
nodes.description: Use fetch, Axios to connect frontend with backend services.

nodes.label: Understand State Management
nodes.description: Learn about Redux, Zustand, or Context API.

nodes.label: Accessibility & Performance
nodes.description: Make your site fast and accessible using best practices.
